summary: User wants a web app (not Play Store) and requests the deployment/shareable link; app name should be "upscQueen".
architectural_notes: App will be a web app accessible via URL (not a Play Store Android APK).
User approved adding the provided logo asset into the app branding/UI.
known_issues: Assistant previously failed to process the "Logo" request (error message shown) before proceeding later.

existing_features.title: Set the application branding to use the name “upscQueen” across the UI (app header/title and primary landing content). All user-facing text must be in English.
Create a simple, mobile-first landing page for “upscQueen” (UPSC guidance/study companion) with at least: a hero section, a short description, and 3–4 feature cards (static content is fine).
Add a “Share this app” section that shows the current deployed URL (derived from the browser location) and provides a one-click copy-to-clipboard button with clear success/error feedback.
Apply a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and components) suitable for an exam-prep/education brand, consistent across all screens. Do not use a blue+purple theme.
Generate and include basic static brand imagery for the app (logo + hero illustration) as frontend static assets and render them on the landing page.
Add the user-uploaded branding images to the frontend as static assets and use them in the upscQueen landing page in place of the current generated logo/hero images.
Add a new section on the upscQueen landing page for “UPSC Previous Year Question Papers” that is visible without authentication and fits the existing visual theme.

In the “UPSC Previous Year Question Papers” section, display a simple, browsable structure (static content is acceptable) that covers at minimum: Prelims (GS Paper I, CSAT) and Mains (Essay, GS I–IV, at least one Optional placeholder).
Add an in-page navigation affordance from the top of the landing page to the “UPSC Previous Year Question Papers” section (e.g., a button/link that scrolls to the section).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create/deploy web app named "upscQueen" and provide shareable link (URL)
Add the approved custom logo/DP branding asset into the upscQueen web app UI (replace/default logo)
Add UPSC previous year/old question papers section/content inside the upscQueen web app
